snippet: In the seven months since allied warplanes in the American-led campaign began bombing select Islamic State targets, the Sunni militancy is holding its own.
abstract: American officials say Islamic State militant group has withstood seven-month American-led bombing campaign against select targets and has continued to launch attacks and expand its ideological reach; tensions within group have become apparent, though, and fighters who have tried to flee group have been executed; much of strain stems from growing pains of the largely decentralized organization.
lead_paragraph: In the seven months since allied warplanes in the American-led campaign began bombing select Islamic State targets, the Sunni militancy is holding its own.

headline.main: Battered but Unbowed, ISIS Is Still on Offensive
headline.print_headline: Battered but Unbowed, ISIS Is Still on Offensive

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
